__IMTHOOK__.label: My WhatsApp Business Cloud Events webhook

messages.content: Create a highly structured and detailed video production prompt Google veo, covering the target audience, objective, product features, storyboarding (including visuals and voiceover), audio elements, and a final Call to Action. The video duration is 8 seconds. The video must be based on the user request: '{{1.messages[].text.body}}'. Output only the generated prompt structure, ensuring no introductory text, headings, or labels (like "Prompt for Video Generation:" or "1. Target Audience:") are included. Start the output immediately with the content of the prompt itself.

spec.help: Configuration of the parameters that the function accepts.
spec.name: parameters
spec.label: Parameters

nested.help:
The URL must be publicly accessible. To test this, you can try opening the URL in an anonymous tab. It must take you directly to the file.
Ensure that the URL is not restricted from automated access. This can involve external platform settings, proxy bot-blocking, and robots.txt configuration.
nested.name: file_uri
nested.label: File URL
